snippet: Protesters blocked Parliament from opening debate on a bill they fear will allow former Prime Minister Thaksin Shinawatra to return from exile.
abstract: Protesters in Thailand block Parliament from opening debate on a bill they fear will allow former prime minister Thaksin Shinawatra to return from exile; discussion on the bill, which would grant amnesty for participants in recent political violence, is postponed indefinitely.
lead_paragraph: Protesters blocked Parliament from opening debate on a bill they fear will allow former Prime Minister Thaksin Shinawatra to return from exile.

keywords.value: Coups D'Etat and Attempted Coups D'Etat
keywords.name: subject
